plot: When the world's population is destroyed by an evil corporation, only one college student can discover what happened, and if anyone else remains.
title: The Remaining
plot_es: When the world's population is destroyed by an evil corporation, only one college student can discover what happened, and if anyone else remains.
plot_en: When the world's population is destroyed by an evil corporation, only one college student can discover what happened, and if anyone else remains.
